stress_errors.reason: Emergency evacuation during armed conflict is extremely stressful. Missing stress stat entirely.
Monitoring dangerous security situation daily is highly stressful. Missing stress stat entirely.
Making life-or-death decisions about selective evacuation is stressful. Missing stress stat entirely.
Medical emergency and evacuation decision is stressful, not stress-relieving. Wrong direction.
Working all-in on reports while delegating field problems causes stress. Missing stress stat.
Organizing major 200-person conference with limited resources is stressful. Missing stress.
All-out effort to reach 90% KPI with exhausted team is stressful. Missing stress.
Organizing large farewell conference while managing handover is stressful. Missing stress.

principled_local_conflicts.reason: Trusting experts and giving autonomy aligns with both principle AND good partnership. Local partners appreciate trust.
Prioritizing staff welfare is a principled leadership decision. Caring for volunteers is both ethical AND builds local relationships.
Requesting budget to maintain quality benefits local beneficiaries too. Quality work helps both sides.
International cooperation with JICA is a principled approach to development. Collaboration is both professional AND locally beneficial.
Transparent investigation ultimately benefits everyone. Short-term friction but long-term trust with honest locals.
Sustainability planning is principled AND directly benefits local partners who continue the work.
Systematically building partner networks is a principled capacity-building approach. Not just personal favors.
Highlighting local contribution is principled recognition of their work. Giving credit where due is ethical.
Forward-thinking expansion planning is a principled long-term approach. Strategic thinking is professional.
Promoting capable local partner to leadership is principled capacity building. Merit-based advancement is ethical.

All-out push to 92% KPI. Text says 'exhausted team' and staff_morale -12. Physical/mental toll.
Large 200-person conference preparation. Staff_morale -6 suggests they're tired from event prep.

reputation_internal_only.reason: Private 1:1 meeting with deputy about morale is purely internal. External stakeholders don't know.
Internal mediation between two deputies is internal management. External partners aren't involved.
Internal decision to slow pace and adapt is internal management style. External stakeholders don't see this.
Sincere conversation to retain deputy is internal HR. External stakeholders don't know about it.
Internal document review with deputy is internal compliance. External reputation would come from audit results, not the review itself.

budget_adjustment_paradox.reason: Requesting additional budget should first cost time/delay (negative), then later gain budget via delayed_effects. Immediate gain is paradoxical.
Requesting budget increase shouldn't immediately grant it. Should be smaller gain or delayed effect, as it requires HQ approval process.
